name: Shoppinsanity 2
description:
After returning to a game you created with some friends when you were young, you find it to be nothing like how you left it..and now its up to you..

Tear up the aisles, find your friends, takedown down headoffice!! 

Gamemodes: Missions

Play through the beginning of the story in the 15 currently available missions. You'll encounter different opponents with 3 different games to play across 5 maps.

Arcade

Set-up a custom race against the CPU on specific maps (unlocked through mission mode). Being able to choose from either the checkpoint gamemode or items.  You can also set the difficulty here ranging from easy to broken.

There is a “how to play” in the app for controls :)

Thanks for playing!
